<traits>

<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 598 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand increases a spell’s duration. Yellow embers spiral over its surface until the spell ends.

<document level="2" id="action-203" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" /> and a duration no less than 10 minutes and no greater than 1 hour.
